english.segment1: The moon is down, and heaven is waiting. for us to find her in our sites. with focus that's strong. but my strength keeps slipping.
english.segment2: Now we're all the terminal cases, but were so determined to thrive. And those with defeat on their faces, are those that we must keep alive. And I admire your strength. You keep us going on. You keep us fighting long after the fire.
english.segment3: You've measured our strides, marked the degree of our fever. Charted the log. Made sure the temperature's rising.
english.segment4: To fan the flames, and brandish our new courage proudly, as if it were ours from the outset. As if we were never alone.
english.segment5: The moon is down, and heaven is waiting, for callers and entries. as we're calling out: "This is ours, ours, ours. This one is ours!"
english.segment6: Now we're all the terminal cases, but we're so determined to thrive. And those with defeat on their faces, are those that we must keep alive. And I admire your strength, you keep us going on, you keep us fighting, long after the fire.
